Snippet.Example: Use the Draft Run field to hide the Exection Status of inadvertant runs in the Execution Grid.
Comments: Updating any field is accomplished through the Field Updates element.
The Field Updates element can be added to any VERA Action.
The below example will mark any selected Run as Draft, but only if the run is in the
Draft or Dry Run Statuses and not already marked as Draft.
Constraints can also be added directly to each Field Update in the Field Updates element.

Actions.Name: Mark Run as Draft
Actions.Label:
Mark Run(s)
as Draft
Actions.Description: Select the run(s) to mark as draft:
